description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d683g","text":"This protocol describes the immunocytochemistry for staining motor neurons derived from induced pluripotent stem cells (iPSCs) using the hNIL transgenic factors in a CLYBL safe harbor site. For the protocol on this differentiation, refer to the Clelland Lab’s Differentiation of iPSCs with the hNIL construct into motor neurons protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

documents.ofn: ICC of motor neurons derived from iPSCs with the hNIL construct_ClellandLab.pdf

Discard the Kimwipes in designated PFA waste. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36ba5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6gcia","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":112},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":187}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d1dut","text":"If fixing and staining need to be performed on separate days, after step 2, wash the plate thrice with 1X DPBS,   each time at slow agitation on the Belly Dancer.
